DOC.brief_summary: Following finding clinical trial drug development , global non-interventional cohort field study investigate rivaroxaban clinical practice condition comparison current standard care patient acute deep vein thrombosis ( DVT ) . The main goal analyze long-term safety use rivaroxaban treatment acute DVT routine clinical practice .
DOC.brief_title: Treatment Acute Deep Vein Thrombosis ( DVT ) With Either Rivaroxaban Current Standard Care Therapy
DOC.criteria: Female male patient Patients > = 18 year Patiebts diagnosis acute DVT indication anticoagulation therapy least 12 week , willing participate study available followup Exclusion criterion must read conjunction local product information .
